cancelMarket().notice: Creator can cancel only while Trading (before or after endTime? -> before endTime),         to prevent ambiguous results after markets close.         Users can then withdraw via `exit()` at any time (since Cancelled allows exit).

exit(uint8,uint256).notice: Exit during Trading (before endTime) or any time if Cancelled.

status().notice: High-level UI status for convenience. 0: Active (Trading/Proposed), 1: Resolved, 2: Cancelled
